Comment 2: 
In this case, a simple "If and only if" would help to clarify it without making the spec
harder to read.

The complaint is somewhat reasonable, because right now it doesn't make any guarantees
that you'll get the same slice back, and if a compiler decides to always create a new
new one (for whatever reason) it could break code written by someone who assumed that
the "if" meant "iff" without violating the specification.
